ValidationRule.description: Requires the Location and Contact on a Case to be populated if it is created in a Status other than 'New'. SE-914. Updated as per SE-2071 ('Canceled' status)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c) && text( Status ) <> 'New' && text( Status ) <> 'Canceled' && text( Status ) <> 'Merged' && (isblank( HRCSVC_Location__c ) || isblank( ContactId )) && $Profile.Name <> 'API Profile' && RecordType.Name = "Care Comm"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must input a Contact and Location to create a Case in a status other than 'New'.
